content:
I didn't mention that I attended a Microsoft Azure meetup two weeks ago. Let me try that again.

I'm thinking of reaching out to the founder of the sustainable fashion startup I met at the mixer to discuss potential collaboration opportunities. By the way, I attended a Microsoft Azure meetup two weeks ago and learned about the latest developments in cloud computing, which got me thinking about how Azure's AI and machine learning capabilities could be used in my project. Do you think that's a good idea?
